All subject randomize 1 2 treatment arm : arm A subject administer pegfilgrastim 6 mg day 1 cycle ( within 4 hour chemotherapy completion ) ; arm B subject administer pegfilgrastim 6 mg day 2 cycle ( least 24 hour chemotherapy completion ) .
